name: 田徑（一）
description: Track and Field is a sport based around the activities of walking, running, jumping and throwing, which are fundamental skills of human movement and the basic skills of all other sports performance. By practicing Track and Field events, sport skills and physical quality can be effectively developed and enhance sport performance of other sport events. Therefore, students taking this course will be able to learn the skills of track and field events and to improve sport performance by applying the ability of running, jumping and throwing.
goals: 瞭解各專長項目的技術及體能訓練要領
修正及穩定各專長項目技術
學會各專長項目體能訓練方法
